name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Engineer with 13+ years of experience in **data visualization**, **runtime profiling**, **cloud migration**, and **infrastructure monitoring**. Expert in **performance optimization** and **data storage** strategies, with a strong focus on developing scalable and efficient SaaS solutions. Proficient in using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for building high-performance applications, alongside hands-on experience with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 
Demonstrated success in leading **cloud-native** deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, leveraging **microservices** and **CI/CD pipelines** for agile development. Recognized for excellent **communication skills** and **technical leadership**, engaging cross-functional teams to drive project success in compliance-driven environments. Solid background in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics and real-time processing, alongside proficiency in **MLOps** tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
